Testo1: Here you don’t enter a world... you create it.
Testo2: Build your own adventure from scratch: choose how your hero is born, which path they will follow, and what they'll encounter along the way.
Testo3: Explore forgotten ruins, fight legendary creatures, and shape every element of the world around you.
Testo7: Alone or with your companions, every story is unique. Every choice matters.
Testo8: This is not a game that guides you.
featuresIntro: Discover the features that make our game unique: every session is a new adventure.
Testo4: Each adventure unfolds on a procedurally generated map. No dungeon is ever the same. Every time, a world to explore.
Testo5: Face unpredictable enemies in a deep and dynamic turn-based system. Every battle is a different challenge.
Testo6: Every hero is different: generated or custom-built, with stories, skills, and traits that make every game unique.

faq1.q: How can I join the beta?
faq1.a: You can sign up by clicking 'Join the Beta' on the homepage and you’ll receive updates via email.

faq2.a: Yes, there will be a free version with optional premium content.

faq3.q: Can I play with my friends?
faq3.a: Absolutely! You can create shared adventures and experience it together.

faq4.q: When will the game be released?
faq4.a: We’re working hard! The official date will be announced via newsletter and social media.

faq5.q: Can I create my own character?
faq5.a: Yes! The character creation system is one of the core features of the game.
